Column.Name: SETTINGS
Individual in Role
Column.Formula: IF( [Role is not System User] <> TRUE, [User in Role], [Person in Role] )

Column.Name: New Individual in Role
Column.Formula: IF( [New Role is not System User] <> TRUE, [New User in Role], [New Person in Role] )

Column.Name: New Role is not System User
New Individual Display Name in Role
Column.Formula: IF( [New Role is not System User] <> TRUE, EBMS_GET_ROLE_DISPLAYNAME([New Individual in Role]), [New Individual in Role] )

Column.Name: Parent Structure

TextCriterion.Text: [DisplayName] IS NOT EMPTY AND [IsSystem] <> TRUE AND [Username] <> 'automatedTester'
CASE WHEN [Local].[Group Filter] = NULL THEN [Username] IN ROLE 'Everyone' ELSE [Username] IN ROLE [Local].[Group Filter] END

Binding.Expression: [New Role is not System User] <> TRUE
COALESCE( [Individual Display Name in Role], [Person in Role], "Unallocated" )
[New Role is not System User] == TRUE

CheckBox.ReferencedDataColumn: New Role is not System User

Binding.Expression: AND( [Can Assign Non-System Users] = TRUE, [Role] <> "Contract Manager", [Role] <> "Evaluation Chair", [Role] <> "Procurement Officer" )

ClosePopupTask.ResultFormula:
HASH( "onCloseEvent", "Update Individual Role Allocation",
"data", HASH( "Status", [Status], "Role", [Role], "Person in Role", [New Person in Role], "Username in Role", [New User in Role], "Role is not a System User", [Role is not System User] ) )
ClosePopupTask.Description: Pass through hash of details for new allocated user

TextCriterion.Text:
CASE
--check that the user is in a group which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
--check that the parent eform isn't a contract. If not, these users should always have access WHEN [Parent EFormType] <> 'Contract' AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
--check that the user is either the previous/current user listed on the record - these users should always have access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [User in Role] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [New User in Role] THEN TRUE
--check that the parent record is a Procurement WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER),[To].[Department]) ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--check that the parent record is a Contract WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CASE --check that the user is in a contract role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE --check that the Contract is not restricted - if not, the following users can access in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER),[To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--check that the parent record is an Evaluation - if true, we need to check both the Evaluation and its parent Procurement WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' THEN ( CASE --check that the user can access via the evaluation WHEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Evaluation] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
--check the parent Procurement from the evaluation WHEN ( STEP TO [Procurement] ON [Parent RecordID] IN ARRAY ([To].[Evaluation RecordIDs]) AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER),[To].[Department]) ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END )
--check that the parent is an information request WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Information Request' THEN ( CASE
--check that the user is in a group which has access to all Information Requests WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Information Request Managers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Paralegals' THEN TRUE
--check that the user is assigned to the Information Request WHEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Information Request] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] GET COUNT(0) > 0 ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END )
ELSE FALSE END

CASE
--check that the user is in a group which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
--check that the parent eform isn't a contract. If not, these users should always have access WHEN [Parent EFormType] <> 'Contract' AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
--check that the parent record is a Procurement WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--check that the parent record is a Contract WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CASE --check that the user is in a contract role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE --check that the Contract is not restricted - if not, the following users can access in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--check that the parent record is an Evaluation - if true, we need to check both the Evaluation and its parent Procurement WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' THEN ( CASE --check that the user can access via the evaluation WHEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Evaluation] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
--check the parent Procurement from the evaluation WHEN ( STEP TO [Procurement] ON [Parent RecordID] IN ARRAY ([To].[Evaluation RecordIDs]) AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END )
--check that the parent is an information request WHEN [Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Information Request' THEN ( CASE
--check that the user is in a group which has access to all Information Requests WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Information Request Managers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Paralegals' THEN TRUE
--check that the user is assigned to the Information Request WHEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Information Request] ON [Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] GET COUNT(0) > 0 ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END )
ELSE FALSE END

FormulaDrivenChangeFieldValues.TargetRecordsFormula: ARRAY_WHERE( ARRAY_CONCAT( ARRAY(ARRAY([Parent EFormType], [Parent RecordID])), [Allocation] ), $(i,item) AND( $item <> NULL, $item <> ARRAY()) )

TriggerCustomEvent.TargetRecordsFormula: ARRAY_WHERE( ARRAY_CONCAT( ARRAY(ARRAY([Parent EFormType], [Parent RecordID])), [Allocation] ), $(i,item) AND( $item <> NULL, $item <> ARRAY()) )
